price: (Abahakanye) baravuga bati “Kuki (Muhamadi) atatuzanira igitangaza giturutse kwa Nyagasani we?” Ese ntibagezweho n’igitangaza (Qur’an) gishimangira ibyavuzwe mu bitabo byabanje?[1]
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا يَأۡتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ تَأۡتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
footnotes: [1] Ibitabo byabanjirije Qur’an ni Suhufi yahishuriwe Intumwa Ibrahim, Zaburi yahishuriwe Intumwa Dawudi, Tawurati yahishuriwe Intumwa Musa, Injiili (Ivanjili) yahishuriwe Intumwa Issa (Yesu). Kubyemera bikaba ari inkingi ya kane mu nkingi zigize ukwemera kwa Isilamu.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā yatīnā biāyatin min rabbihi awalam tatihim bayyinatu mā fī al-ṣuḥufi al-ūlā
